short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open corresponding 'Fallen London Wiki' page with one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a small "button" near the storylet title. When clicked, this button opens a new tab with a Fallen London Wiki page corresponding to the current storylet.
